triggers.header: Execute custom actions based on {COUNT} event types
triggers.resyncBt_tt:
If you changed something
on OBS, click this to see it
listed on OBS actions
triggers.noChannelPoints_tt:
You are not a Twitch affiliate
or you have refused Twitchat
to control this
triggers.queue_info: To make sure some triggers execute one after another, associate them to the same execution queue.

music.require: These triggers need you to connect with Spotify under the {URL}

count.require: These triggers need you to first {URL}

schedule.conflict: A schedule with this name already exists

common.select_action: Select the action type to execute
common.dynamic_placeholder_info: This action allows you to create a custom placeholder that you can use on subsequent actions.
common.dynamic_trigger: Execute a random trigger amgonst the selected ones
common.action_obs_tt:
You need to connect with OBS
on the Connexions section
common.action_tts_tt:
This needs the text to speech
feature to be enabled
common.action_music_tt:
You need to
connect Spotify
on the Connexions section

chat.loop: The message starts with the actual command name, this will lead to infinite message loop!
chat.param_message: Message to send on your chat
chat.conflict: A command with this name already exists
chat.allowed_users: Users allowed to use this command
chat.param_alertCD: Tell users if they're cooled down
chat.tip_example: {TITLE} {CMD} will set your chat in 30 minutes followers only

highlight.header: You need to configure the {LINK} to use this action.

music.header: This feature needs you to connect with Spotify under the {LINK}

obs.media_source: If using a placeholder on the Media file path, folder navigation chars like {CMD1} and {CMD2} will be removed for security reasons.
obs.media_source_example: : if setting this as the path {PATH1}, users won't be able to send {PATH2}

trigger.beta: This is a beta feature!{BR} If you experience any unexpected behavior with it please {LINK}
trigger.warning: Placeholders may not be available on the selected trigger.
trigger.warning_example: : If you execute a Chat command trigger from a Scheduled action trigger, the {'{'}USER{'}'} and {'{'}MESSAGE{'}'} placeholders won't be available as it won't be executed from an actual chat message.
trigger.no_trigger: You don't have any existing trigger yet

tts.header: This feature needs you to enable {LINK} feature
tts.param_message: Message to read with text to speech

http_ws.protocol_error: Due to browser security restrictions, only 127.0.0.1 or localhost domains can ben called with HTTP protocol. Use HTTPS for other domains.

countget.example: Use {PLACEHOLDER} key in any field of the actions after this one to get the counter's value.

random.example: Use {PLACEHOLDER} key in any field of the actions after this one to get the random value.
random.list_label: Pick a random entry amongst these ones:

raffle_enter.info: The user triggering the current event will enter any currently running raffle. It will do nothing if no raffle has been created first.

placeholders.pinned_by_id: ID of the user who pinned the mesage
placeholders.shoutout_in: User that gave you a shoutout
placeholders.shoutout_out: User you gave a shoutout to

CHAT_COMMAND.label: Chat command
CHAT_COMMAND.description: Execute actions when sending a command on your chat

ANY_MESSAGE.label: Any message
ANY_MESSAGE.description: Execute actions everytime a message is received on chat

REWARD_REDEEM.label: Channel point reward
REWARD_REDEEM.description:
Execute actions when the following channel point reward is redeemed
{'{'}SUB_ITEM_NAME{'}'}

COMMUNITY_CHALLENGE_PROGRESS.label: Community challenge progress
COMMUNITY_CHALLENGE_PROGRESS.description: Execute actions when a user contributes to a community challenge

COMMUNITY_CHALLENGE_COMPLETE.label: Community challenge complete
COMMUNITY_CHALLENGE_COMPLETE.description: Execute actions when a community challenge completes

STREAM_INFO_UPDATE.label: Stream info update
STREAM_INFO_UPDATE.description: Execute actions when the stream info are updated

FIRST_ALL_TIME.label: First message of a user all time
FIRST_ALL_TIME.description: Execute actions when a user sends a message for the first time on your channel

FIRST_TODAY.label: First message of a user today
FIRST_TODAY.description: Execute actions when a user sends a message for the first time today

RETURNING_USER.label: Returning user
RETURNING_USER.description:
Execute actions when a user comes back after chatting at least twice in the last 30 days.
(ceci n'existe peut-Ãªtre plus sur Twitch)

PRESENTATION.label: User presentation
PRESENTATION.description: Execute actions when a user sends a presentation message.

FOLLOW.label: Follow
FOLLOW.description: Execute actions when someone follows the channel

RAID.label: Raid received
RAID.description: Execute actions when someone raids the channel

SHOUTOUT_OUT.label: Shoutout given
SHOUTOUT_OUT.description: Execute actions when giving a shoutout to someone

SHOUTOUT_IN.label: Shoutout received
SHOUTOUT_IN.description: Execute actions when given a shoutout on another channel

POLL_RESULT.label: Poll result
POLL_RESULT.description: Execute actions when a poll completes

PREDICTION_RESULT.label: Prediction result
PREDICTION_RESULT.description: Execute actions when a prediction completes

RAFFLE_RESULT.label: Raffle result
RAFFLE_RESULT.description: Execute actions when a raffle completes

BINGO_RESULT.label: Bingo result
BINGO_RESULT.description: Execute actions when a bingo completes

SUB.label: Sub
SUB.description: Execute actions when someone subscribes to the channel

SUBGIFT.label: Subgift
SUBGIFT.description: Execute actions when someones subgifts someone else

CHEER.label: Bits
CHEER.description: Execute actions when someone sends bits

HYPE_TRAIN_APPROACHING.label: Hype train approach
HYPE_TRAIN_APPROACHING.description: Execute actions when a hype train approaches

HYPE_TRAIN_START.label: Hype train start
HYPE_TRAIN_START.description: Execute actions when a hype train starts

HYPE_TRAIN_PROGRESS.label: Hype train progress
HYPE_TRAIN_PROGRESS.description: Execute actions when a hype train progresses

HYPE_TRAIN_END.label: Hype train end
HYPE_TRAIN_END.description: Execute actions when a hype train ends

HYPE_TRAIN_CANCELED.label: Hype train canceled
HYPE_TRAIN_CANCELED.description: Execute actions when a hype train fails

HYPE_TRAIN_COOLDOWN.label: Hype train cooldown
HYPE_TRAIN_COOLDOWN.description: Execute actions when a hype train can, be started again

TIMEOUT.label: User timed out
TIMEOUT.description: Execute actions when a user is <mark>/timeout</mark>

BAN.label: User banned
BAN.description: Execute actions when a user is <mark>/ban</mark>

UNBAN.label: User unbanned
UNBAN.description: Execute actions when a user is <mark>/unban</mark>

VIP.label: User /vip
VIP.description: Execute actions when a user is added to your VIPs

UNVIP.label: User /unvip
UNVIP.description:
Execute actions when a user is removed from your VIPs
(only works when using /unvip command from twitchat

MOD.label: User /mod
MOD.description: Execute actions when a user is added to your mods

UNMOD.label: User /unmod
UNMOD.description:
Execute actions when a user is removed from your mods
(only works when using /unmod command from twitchat

SHIELD_MODE_ON.label: Shield mode enabled
SHIELD_MODE_ON.description: Execute actions when shield mode is enabled

SHIELD_MODE_OFF.label: Shield mode disabled
SHIELD_MODE_OFF.description: Execute actions when shield mode is disabled

PIN_MESSAGE.label: Pin message
PIN_MESSAGE.description: Execute actions when pinning a message

UNPIN_MESSAGE.label: Unpin message
UNPIN_MESSAGE.description: Execute actions when unpinning a message

TRACK_ADDED_TO_QUEUE.label: Track added to queue
TRACK_ADDED_TO_QUEUE.description: Execute actions when a music is added to the queue

MUSIC_START.label: Music starts playing
MUSIC_START.description: Execute actions when a music starts playing

MUSIC_STOP.label: Music stops playing
MUSIC_STOP.description: Execute actions when a music stops playing

SCHEDULE.label: Scheduled actions
SCHEDULE.description: Execute actions regularly or at specific date/time

TIMER_START.label: Timer start
TIMER_START.description: Execute actions when a timer is started with the command <mark>/timerStart</mark>

TIMER_STOP.label: Timer stop
TIMER_STOP.description: Execute actions when a timer is stoped with the command <mark>/timerStop</mark>

COUNTDOWN_START.label: Countdown start
COUNTDOWN_START.description: Execute actions when a countdown is started with the command <mark>/countdown</mark>

COUNTDOWN_STOP.label: Countdown stop
COUNTDOWN_STOP.description: Execute actions when a countdown completes or is stoped

SHOUTOUT.label: Shoutout (Twitchat)
SHOUTOUT.description: Execute actions when doing a shoutout via <mark>/so</mark> command or shoutout button

EMERGENCY_MODE_START.label: Emergency start
EMERGENCY_MODE_START.description: Execute actions when enabling the emergency mode

EMERGENCY_MODE_STOP.label: Emergency stop
EMERGENCY_MODE_STOP.description: Execute actions when stopping the emergency mode

HIGHLIGHT_CHAT_MESSAGE.label: Highlighted message
HIGHLIGHT_CHAT_MESSAGE.description: Execute actions when requesting to highlight a message

CHAT_ALERT.label: Chat alert
CHAT_ALERT.description:
Execute actions when the Chat Alert feature is triggered
(Parameters => @:params.categories.features => @:params.alertMode)

VOICEMOD.label: Voicemod - voice changed
VOICEMOD.description: Execute actions when changing the voice effect on voicemod

OBS_SCENE.label: Switch to scene
OBS_SCENE.description: Execute actions when switching to <mark>{'{'}SUB_ITEM_NAME{'}'}</mark> OBS scene

OBS_SOURCE_ON.label: Source show
OBS_SOURCE_ON.description: Execute actions when showing <mark>{'{'}SUB_ITEM_NAME{'}'}</mark> OBS source

OBS_SOURCE_OFF.label: Source hide
OBS_SOURCE_OFF.description: Execute actions when hiding <mark>{'{'}SUB_ITEM_NAME{'}'}</mark> OBS source

STREAM_ONLINE.label: Stream start
STREAM_ONLINE.description:
Execute actions when stream starts
(you might have to wait +1min before receiving that info)

STREAM_OFFLINE.label: Stream stop
STREAM_OFFLINE.description:
Execute actions when stream stops
(you might have to wait +1min before receiving that info)

COUNTER_ADD.label: Value added to a counter
COUNTER_ADD.description: Execute actions when adding a value to a counter

COUNTER_DEL.label: Value removed from a counter
COUNTER_DEL.description: Execute actions when removing a value from a counter

COUNTER_MAXED.label: Max value reached
COUNTER_MAXED.description: Execute actions when counter's value reaches max value

COUNTER_MINED.label: Min value reached
COUNTER_MINED.description: Execute actions when counter's value reaches min value

COUNTER_LOOPED.label: Value looped
COUNTER_LOOPED.description:
Execute actions when counter's value looped
(if "loop" option is enabled and value reaches max, value will switch to min and vice versa)

RAID_STARTED.label: Started a raid
RAID_STARTED.description: Execute actions when starting a raid to another channel

musicEvents.ADD_TRACK_TO_QUEUE: Add a track to the queue
